textBox.richText: Well, this is gonna be a short entry since I’m not really in the mood for blogging today and since Super Mario Bros. Wii is waiting for me ;) I’m now back in Heidelberg after a really nice christmas in DK. I managed to see many of my friends, spend a lot of quality time with my family and best of all I had some great days with Mette. I hope that all of you had a nice christmas as well! I have uploaded some pictures which basically takes you through my christmas. Admitted, there are food and drinks in many of the pictures, but isn’t that what christmas is all about? Maybe you’ll get some details about my christmas next time, but we’ll have so see about that... Happy new year and talk to you next time KBS
